name: USD Coin
reason: The standard unit of account. Centralized (Circle) and subject to censorship. 5% risk premium.

name: Tether USD
reason: Offshore banking dollar. Higher opacity risk than USDC, but equal utility. Same tariff class.

name: Euro Coin
reason: European fiat standard. Same censorship profile as USDC.

name: PayPal USD
reason: Corporate Fintech dollar. Highly regulated, high seizure risk.

name: Hubble USD
reason: Decentralized stablecoin backed by SOL collateral. Harder to censor than USDC, but peg risk is higher.

name: UXD Stablecoin
reason: Algorithmic stablecoin with troubled history and insurance fund issues. High risk.

name: International Stable Currency
reason: Flatcoin pegged to a basket of commodities/assets, not just USD. Better inflation hedge.

name: Sky Dollar (Solana)
reason: Rebranded DAI. Decentralized governance but heavy RWA backing means regulatory exposure.
